articles.content: On the very first day of the new quarter, one Wall Street analyst sounded the alarm on Apple stock. According to Goldman Sachs’ Rod Hall, there is “significant downside risk” to investing in shares o… [+4380 chars]

articles.title: Here’s what’ll happen with software updates for LG phones after shutdown - Android Authority
articles.description: Android 12 might still be on the cards for some LG phones, but nothing is set in stone.
articles.content:
• LG will continue providing software updates to certain phones in certain regions even after its mobile division shuts down.
  • Android 12 might also be on the cards for some LG phones.

articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.title: Tencent-owned studio behind Call of Duty: Mobile reportedly earned $10 billion in 2020 - The Verge
articles.description: TiMi Studios, the Tencent-owned developer of huge mobile hits Call of Duty: Mobile and Honor of Kings, earned a staggering $10 billion in revenue in 2020. While TiMi might not be a household name, its games are some of the biggest in the world.
articles.content:
Thats a lot of money
Image: Activision
